short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A digital bookshelf where users can easily store and organize all their books.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Digital Bookshelf Organization: Managing and finding books on a laptop can be cumbersome, so the idea is to create a digital bookshelf where users can easily store and organize all their books.

Quick Access to Current Book: Users can quickly find and resume reading their current book without distractions, allowing them to focus on their reading goals.

Automatic Reading Tracking: The platform automatically tracks users' reading habits, including time spent reading and pages read per day, helping users stay consistent with their reading goals.

Book Filtering and Search: Users can filter books based on categories or use search functionalities to find specific books in their library, enhancing overall organization and accessibility.

Reading Time Tracking: Users can track their reading time either by using a stopwatch or by setting predetermined reading intervals using techniques like the Pomodoro timer method.

Customized Reading Modes: The platform offers customizable reading modes such as scrolling or page-by-page reading, allowing users to tailor their reading experience based on preferences like viewing single or double-page layouts.

Note Taking and Learning Enrichment: Users can record all their notes and comments within the platform, leading to a more enriched learning experience and deeper engagement with the material.
